title: San Francisco Police Hold News Conference on Attack Against Paul Pelosi

media:group.media:title: San Francisco Police Hold News Conference on Attack Against Paul Pelosi
media:group.media:description:
San Francisco Police Department Chief William Scott on attack of Paul Pelosi, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's husband: "The suspect pulled the hammer away from Mr. Pelosi and violently assaulted him with it. Our officers immediately tackled the suspect, disarmed him, took him into custody, requested emergency backup and rendered medical aid.
https://www.c-span.org/video/?523922-1/san-francisco-police-hold-news-conference-attack-paul-pelosi&live
